scripts.generate-proto-types: shx rm -rf ./src/generated && shx mkdir -p ./src/generated && C:\protobuf\bin\protoc.exe --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=E:\PetProject\IoT-Manager\packages\proto\node_modules\.bin\protoc-gen-ts_proto.cmd --ts_proto_out=./src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,lowerCaseServiceMethods=true,outputClientImpl=true,addNestjsRestParameter=true,useAbortController=true -I ./proto ./proto/*.proto && pnpm build
